unnormalised: Campus hiring at IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad for 2024 looks promising! Our firm, based in Bangalore, plans to visit NIT Trichy on 22/08/2023 at 10:00 hrs to scout for fresh talent. Looking for skilled candidates especially in data analytics. We're offering competitive packages around Rs. 8 Lakhs per annum. Hope to finalize selections by 15/09/2023. This initiative supports the Skill India Mission. Please contact Ms. Sharma by 05:00 PM on 29/08/2023 for clarifications. Good luck!
normalised: Campus hiring at I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad for two thousand and twenty four looks promising! Our firm, based in Bangalore, plans to visit N I T Trichy on twenty second august two thousand and twenty three at ten zero zero hours to scout for fresh talent. Looking for skilled candidates especially in data analytics. We are offering competitive packages around rupee eight lakhs per annum. Hope to finalize selections by fifteenth september two thousand and twenty three. This initiative supports the Skill India Mission. Please contact Missus Sharma by five zero zero P M on twenty ninth august two thousand and twenty three for clarifications. Good luck!
